creator: univerz@21cn.com
text:
In my emplementation of HttpSessionListener,in the sessionDestroyed method,when 
I call session.getAttribute("something"),Exception occur,this did not happened 
when I try with jetty.

java.lang.IllegalStateException: getAttribute: Session already invalidated
	at org.apache.catalina.session.StandardSession.getAttribute
(StandardSession.java:954)
	at org.apache.catalina.session.StandardSessionFacade.getAttribute
(StandardSessionFacade.java:171)
	at org.ofbiz.core.stats.VisitHandler.getVisit(VisitHandler.java:113)
	at org.ofbiz.core.control.ControlEventListener.sessionDestroyed
(ControlEventListener.java:66)
	at org.apache.catalina.session.StandardSession.expire
(StandardSession.java:659)
	at org.apache.catalina.session.StandardSession.expire
(StandardSession.java:608)
	at org.apache.catalina.session.StandardManager.processExpires
(StandardManager.java:793)
	at org.apache.catalina.session.StandardManager.run
(StandardManager.java:870)
	at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:534)

creator: remm@apache.org
text:
Do not file duplicates on purpose !!!!
